en:
Really? That's great to hear!
Means I don't have to worry 'bout a
decrease in reservations.

You sound a little unsure, though...
Ya sure everything's okay, @CharacterName?

Yikes... Flat on your face, huh...
I can definitely see that.
Well, best to stay optimistic!

You're all workin' hard to get the crystals
back, aren't ya?

You do that, and I'll make sure ya have a
room to stay in.

...First-aid's in the drawer on my left, if ya
have any need for that...
Because, ya know, your face is still a lil' red.
